str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Apparently a primary word; an 'hour'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To exult, be full of joy. From agan and hallomai; properly, to jump for joy, i.e. Exult.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Wind, breath, spirit.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: From ek and homologeo; to acknowledge or agree fully.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
And, even, also, namely.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To hide away, conceal, keep secret. From apo and krupto; to conceal away; figuratively, to keep secret.
This; he, she, it.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Wise, learned, cultivated, skilled, clever. Akin to saphes; wise.
And, even, also, namely.
Intelligent, prudent, wise, understanding, discerning. From suniemi; mentally put together, i.e. Sagacious.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To uncover, bring to light, reveal. From apo and kalupto; to take off the cover, i.e. Disclose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From an obsolete particle ne- and epos; not speaking, i.e. An infant; figuratively, a simple-minded person, an immature Christian.
Yes, certainly, even so. A primary particle of strong affirmation; yes.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From a presumed compound of eu and the base of dokeo; satisfaction, i.e. delight, or kindness, wish, purpose.
From en and pros; in front of (literally or figuratively) or time).
